Here, the axis values represent allelic transcription (x) and HPTM enrichment (y), with positive values being biased toward the paternal allele, and negative values being biased toward the maternal allele. ASI values are “=” for transcript and peak being baised toward the same allele, “NS” for either transcript or peak not showing allelic bias, and “≠” for biased toward opposite alleles.
